name: Armville
description:
Archie really needs those five red books scattered throughout his library.
Use your mechanical arm to push yourself off of any surface or grab onto ledges and swing around them.Armville was a student project done in the second semester of the Game Design course at HTW BerlinCredits:Hien Quy Tran (@HienQuyTran)
Jeremia Oelschläger
Josia Roncancio (@w7games)
Klemens Reckfort (@Korrecktfort)
Maximilian Warsinke (@Warsinke)(CONTROLLER REQUIRED!)
